title: It Is Well With My Soul

sections.label: Verse 1
sections.content:

When sorrows like sea billows roll
Whatever my lot, You have taught me to say
It is well, it is well with my soul

sections.label: Verse 2
sections.content:
But Lord it's for Thee, for Thy coming we wait
The sky not the grave is our goal
Oh, trump of the angel, oh, voice of the Lord
Blessed hope, blessed rest of my soul

With my soul

With my soul

With my soul

With my soul

sections.label: Verse 1
sections.content:
See Him in Jerusalem
Walking where the crowds are
Once these streets had sung to Him
Now they cry for murder
Such a frail and lonely man
Holding up the heavy cross
See Him walking in Jerusalem
On the road to save us

sections.label: Verse 2
sections.content:
See him there upon the hill
Hear the scorn and laughter
Silent as a lamb he waits
Praying to the father

sections.label: Verse 2
sections.content:
See the king who made the sun
And the moon and shining stars
Let the soldiers hold and nail him down
So that he could save them

sections.label: Verse 3
sections.content:
See him there upon the cross
Now no longer breathing
Dust that formed the watching crowds
Takes the blood of Jesus

sections.label: Verse 3
sections.content:
Feel the earth is shaking now
See the veil is split in two
And he stood before the wrath of God

sections.label: Verse 4
sections.content:
See the empty tomb today
Death could not contain him
Once the servant of the world
Now in victory reigning

sections.label: Verse 4
sections.content:

Who is seated on the throne
See him in the new Jerusalem
Praise the one who saved us (x2)

title: My Labour Is Not In Vain

sections.label: Verse 1
sections.content:
Amazing grace, how sweet the sound
That saved a wretch like me
I once was lost, but now am found
Was blind but now I see

sections.label: Verse 2
sections.content:
’Twas grace that taught my heart to fear
And grace my fears relieved
How precious did that grace appear
The hour I first believed

sections.label: Verse 3
sections.content:
The Lord hath promised good to me
His word my hope secures
He will my shield and portion be
As long as life endures

sections.label: Verse 4
sections.content:
When we’ve been there ten thousand years
Bright shining as the sun
We’ve no less days to sing God’s praise
Than when we first begun.

sections.label: Verse 1
sections.content:
In Christ alone my hope is found
He is my light, my strength, my song
This Cornerstone, this solid Ground
Firm through the fiercest drought and storm
What heights of love, what depths of peace
When fears are stilled, when strivings cease
My comforter, my All in All
Here in the love of Christ I stand

sections.label: Verse 2
sections.content:
In Christ alone, who took on flesh
Fullness of God in helpless babe
This gift of love and righteousness
Scorned by the ones He came to save
'Til on that cross as Jesus died
The wrath of God was satisfied
For every sin on Him was laid
Here in the death of Christ I live, I live

sections.label: Verse 3
sections.content:
There in the ground His body lay
Light of the world by darkness slain
Then bursting forth in glorious day
Up from the grave He rose again
And as He stands in victory
Sin’s curse has lost its grip on me
For I am His and He is mine
Bought with the precious blood of Christ

sections.label: Verse 4
sections.content:
No guilt in life, no fear in death
This is the power of Christ in me
From life’s first cry to final breath
Jesus commands my destiny
No power of hell, no scheme of man
Can ever pluck me from His hand
Til He returns or calls me home
Here in the power of Christ I’ll stand

sections.label: Bridge
sections.content:

I find my hope
I find my help

When fear assails
When darkness falls
I find my peace
In Christ alone
I give my life
I give my all
I sing this song
To Christ alone
The King of Kings
The Lord of all

To Christ alone

sections.label: Outro
sections.content:
Till He returns or calls me home
Here in the power of Christ I’ll stand
Here in the power of Christ we stand

sections.label: Verse 1

title: Yet Not I But Through Christ In Me

sections.label: Verse 1
sections.content:
What gift of grace is Jesus, my Redeemer
There is no more for heaven now to give

sections.content:

For my life is wholly bound to His

Yet not I, but through Christ in me

sections.content:
The night is dark but I am not forsaken
For by my side, the Savior He will stay
I labour on in weakness and rejoicing

sections.label: Chorus 2
sections.content:
To this I hold, my Shepherd will defend me
Through the deepest valley He will lead
Oh the night has been won and I shall overcome

sections.label: Verse 3
sections.content:
No fate I dread, I know I am forgiven
The future sure, the price it has been paid

And He was raised to overthrow the grave

sections.label: Chorus 3
sections.content:
To this I hold, my sin has been defeated
Jesus now and ever is my plea
All the chains are released, I can sing "I am free"
Yet not I, but through Christ in me

sections.label: Verse 4
sections.content:
With every breath, I long to follow Jesus
For He has said that He will bring me home
And day by day, I know He will renew me
Until I stand with joy before the throne

sections.label: Chorus 4
sections.content:
To this I hold, my hope is only Jesus
All the glory evermore to Him
When the race is complete, still my lips shall repeat
"Yet not I, but through Christ in me"
